::KitKat::

She saw Drillbit get hit.  She ran to him and stood next to him.\
"Stop shooting.  Stop! If you  don't you will not make it out of here 
alive.  Seace fire and get out of here. NOW!" she yelled at Airbomber.

She put her arm around Drillbit's shoulders. "You OK?"  She saw him 
hit and the mechfluid ozzing out his wound. She winced at the thought 
of how bad her hit looked.  She smiled at Drillbit.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit looked down. Teh shot he had tryed to block from KitKat, 
had
> passed through him, and hit her in the side.
> "Stop shooting, and you can walk out of here, now!" He yelled at
> AirBomber.
